Delivery Hero Germany | Berlin | Onsite

We are the leading food ordering company in Germany and part of the delivery hero group https://www.deliveryhero.com .

Over the last few months we have been rebuilding our tech stack for our brand pizza.de that we will relaunch soon. We are now looking for a product manager to manage our mobile apps.

You will get a chance to work on apps that get millions of orders per year with a very dedicated customer base.

If you are interested email me at daniel.santos at deliveryhero.com or you can apply at http://career.deliveryhero.com/jobs/job/?id=o1qe4fwt
